name: Headed Home (ollienoseworthy)
description:
You had a long day at work and are excited to arrive at home. On the way, however, you approach some strange things and people. 

This is a short PSX horror game made in about two weeks. Headed Home is imitating PS1 graphics trying to create an "old" effect. I really hope that you enjoy this game and don't forget to leave a like.

If you notice any errors or glitches in the game, make sure to report them  in the comments down below.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Mouse - Look
